title: A brief review on the assessment of potential joint effects of complex mixtures of contaminants in the environment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, 3,661-675
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00014E, Critical Review
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yu Cheng, Jue Ding, Catherine Estefany Davila Arenas, Markus Brinkmann, Xiaowen Ji
Many contaminants can have long-term effects on organisms when they are exposed to low concentrations for extended periods. This review presents new methods for identifying the effects of chemical mixtures.
